campaigns.name: Junior Analysts
campaigns.messageTemplateA: Hey {{firstName}}, I'm building a new AI that's giving junior analysts an unfair advantage. It cuts research from days to minutes using causal reasoning. Worth 15 minutes over coffee?
campaigns.messageTemplateB: Hey {{firstName}}, I'm building a new AI turning filings/news/macro into causal insights in seconds. No more copy-paste marathons. Coffee this week if you're curious?
